I just have to let upcoming buyers to know that there is no way anyone in your party of four can be an AI. When you start a lobby, it has to be filled with real players, and it has to be four. Same with the hunter/killer, it cannot be AI. I have short playtime daily and the lobby queue is too long for me during my hours (there seem to be less player). If you are a very private player who just plays with very few friends and who do not like random player joining your game (I remember the L2d2 player trolls), this game isn't for you. You can't even customize your own campaign to just start a private match with just your buddy and you. It wont start. Unlike any multiplayer games I used to play in the past, there is no way a bot can fill the role of your team mate, the game wont start. Besides, I think this game is too much gore and psychological torture for me. I was only interested with the Resident Evil DLC. Nothing against the game, just enlightening people what the game is and how it operates so you know if what you are buying. If you like this game, sure it can be good most especially when you love PVP and just random play with random people. Again, the game wont start until the party of 4, and a killer is filled by real people. AI is totally absent in this game, besides in the tutorial. I think I'm just going to go back to shooting zombies after this refund. I hope the game description highlights the an important fact that "AI is completely disabled in this game".

Jogo mal otimizado para um caralho, behavour (empresa do jogo) cagando para os seus jogadores e tornando DBD um jogo padronizado, na qual serve apenas para ganhar dinheiro, ao invés de ouvir a comunidade e começar a trabalhar melhor na otimização do jogo e em outros fatores (que estão fazendo o DBD cair igual bosta na privada), os caras querem o dinheiro de novatos no game, sefuder em'-')
lots of fun . which there was different modes.something different to do

Es un juego muy divertido y mas aun si es con amigos. Está desbalanceado a veces del lado de los asesinos el cual en varias ocasiones es muy fuerte en comparacion a los supervivientes. 
Ademas el tiempo que se tarda en la progresion de personajes en cuanto a nivel es bastante y eso se nota aun mas en este evento de aniversario donde apenas se pueden avanzar personajes ahora con las tartas de sacrificio. 

Por lo demás, un juego lleno de mecánicas por aprender y por estrategias que practicar y mucho contenido y horas de juego, recomendado y mas ahora que está en descuento a poco mas de 100 Pesos Argentinos, si tienen amigos para jugar ni lo duden en comprarlo.
Si están solos, pueden comprarlo igualmente, es muy entretetnido y siempre te mantiene ocupado y cada partida con cada personaje y build es muy distinta
Ta weno a veces da miedo

A proposta do jogo é muito interessante! Porém, sinto que existe um descaso da equipe em manter a qualidade do jogo. Enquanto vários bugs perduram em boa parte das plataformas, a prioridade é lançar skins. Os eventos são muito do mesmo e nunca têm criatividade.

Mesmo assim, não paro de jogar! Se for comprar, compre com consciência disso!

This game is amazing! i love the amazing tension when you think that you will die then you escape.It is a rush!

I played this game for 3 years on xbox and moved over to pc. I had to restart all my progress but didn't care that much about it. All of these new updates and characters make the game 10x worse. Why do i have to pay for feng min and for the doctor now? They were free back then and now they aren't? You don't have to spam A or Space anymore when you're hooked, all you have to do is hit ez skill checks, which in my opinion is stupid. It's basically impossible to win unless you're 4 stacking or literally playing a blind killer. The new killers that are being added aren't even scary, this game went from a horror survival game to what seems like a crappy Alpha staged rip-off of the old dead by daylight. 
   PS. Since this game is crossplay now you should let me transfer my xbox data over to pc. 
   PS.PS. If ur reading this and you camp 24/7 when u hook a survivor, i hate you.

Been playing DBD since day 1 release of the console port. it's been a long good 5 years with its funny moments and frustrating ones. The game is really fun, and while the community is very toxic, can be very fun at times. This game has brought all my favorite horror icons to life and that's all I've ever wanted from a game as a child. If you love cat chase mouse survival horror games, then this right here is definitely it
great game, its got its faults and may make you very angry and discouraged. but dont let that stop you from enjoying the good parts ive made many friends on this game.

The game is imbalanced, buggy, and gameplay forces toxicity on both sides.

Love this game and the way they've improved it over the years. Great for when needing a break from COD.

This game is both a blessing and a curse. It's fun, but frustrating.

As someone who mostly plays soloQ survivor, this game isn't and never will be balanced to me. SoloQ survivor is likely the most challenging way to play this game - perks work better with teammates, knowledge is power and you get that with teammates, the killer only needs to worry about themselves but as a survivor you need to worry about 3 others and the killer. 

This recent update (July 19th, 2022) has codified exactly what the developers want: a killer sided game. This update survivors got incredibly nerfed while killers got across-the-board buffs. It's frustrating. It can be demoralizing. The best way I can suggest playing this game is to run the perks you find joy in, and just "go next." Sitting while spectating just to say a few mean words to the killer because you were tunneled out does nothing for you. Play the game, then just move on when you die.

It's a fun game, immensely fun if you're playing with a group of friends and can laugh and joke together. It can be frustrating, tilting, and demoralizing when playing SoloQ or with killer. But through all the bad, I have over 400 hours in this game and have no intentions of not playing it for 400 more, and all the negative reviews with thousands of hours are the exact same way. This game is an addiction, and whether or not it's a good or a bad one is up to you.

This game is great. I normally hate horror-esq games with a few exceptions like Little Nightmares and Phasmophobia. But this game is great. It puts you on the edge of your seat and still works as a good horror game. With the wide array of villians from the chainsaw wielding Hillbilly to the Nightmare fueled Freddy Krueger. Yep you can even play as movie killers with more being added practically every month. And you can even play as the monsters which gives you some less horror based game play. But yeah no it sucks.
Lleno de bugs y mal optimizado, pero vaya juegazo 10/10
Amazing scary fun at night is a amasing game would reccommend
An amazing game all around, minus the insane matchmaking.

Mmmmm yes, an entertaining experience to say the least. This game is quite fun, depending on your situation. You bring some buddies, do some surviving, not get facecamped, cheap mori'd, or salted on, it's quite fun. Most of the time, and I mean MOST of the time the people on this game are quite chill, but sometimes others get mad at you. Did you target someone? No. Did you facecamp? No. Did you play the game as intended, kill survivors and have fun as the killer? Yes. Did the guy tbag you at the end and get mori'd out of sheer karma? Yes. I personally prefer playing as the killer, but the survivors are fun too, and hey, if this game manages to make a 1 vs 4 scenario fun, what can't it do? And don't say make counters for spirit, just don't!
